mapper.select: SELECT rtn.rsc_return_code, rtn.rsc_return_date, rtn.rsc_cd_code, rsccode.rsc_cd_name, rsccode.rsc_cd_unit, rtn.rsc_return_vol, rtn.rsc_return_prc, rtn.rsc_return_resn, emp.emp_name,rtn.rsc_return_remk FROM BF_RSC_RETURN rtn LEFT JOIN BF_CMN_RSC_CODE rsccode ON rtn.rsc_cd_code = rsccode.rsc_cd_code LEFT JOIN BF_CMN_EMP emp ON rtn.emp_id = emp.emp_id ORDER BY 1
